pageProduct.name: Vital Pea Protein Performance Powder 500g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Our New Vital Performance protein formula is specifically designed to assist with muscle function and recovery, pre or post exercise. It contains the higest quality European pea protein mixed with L-Glutamine, tart cherry, manganese and magnesium. This powerful vegan blend helps to reduce soreness and build and restore muscle tissue.

Warnings

Consult your health care practitioner as individuals may vary.

Common Uses

Vital Performance formula is a protein formula designed to assist with muscle function and recovery pre or post exercise. 

Ingredients

European Pea Protein (18.5g per 30g serve), L-Glutamine (5g per 30g serve), Tart Cherry (250mg per 30g serve), Manganese (6mg per 30g serve), Magnesium (350mg per 30g serve) and natural vanilla flavour

Directions

Dissolve 30g (two large heaped tablespoons) into 200mL of water, milk (non dairy is suggested) or juice of your choice, consume once daily, before or after exercise.
